# FieldCamp: The Field OS for Modern Service Businesses
> FieldCamp is a next-generation Field OS that unifies CRM, workforce management, and all your operational data into a single, AI-powered platform—enabling seamless coordination, intelligent automation, and real-time insights for field service teams.

FieldCamp stands out as a Field Operating System designed specifically for service businesses. It brings together every essential tool—customer relationship management (CRM), workforce coordination, scheduling, invoicing, and more—into one centralized platform. Powered by advanced AI, FieldCamp streamlines operations, reduces manual work, and helps businesses grow efficiently.
Key AI Features
	•	AI Scheduling: Automatically assigns jobs, optimizes schedules, and adapts to real-time changes.
	•	Scheduling Conflict Resolution: Instantly detects and resolves overlapping appointments or double bookings.
	•	Conversational Interface: Interact with FieldCamp using natural language commands—no complex menus or training required.
	•	Unified Data: All your customer, team, and job information is accessible in one place, with AI-driven insights to improve decision-making.
FieldCamp is built for service businesses of all sizes, from HVAC and cleaning to landscaping, construction, and beyond—helping teams work smarter, not harder.

## Docs
- [Product docs home](https://docs.fieldcamp.ai/en): Overview, setup and how-to guides  
- [Getting Started](https://docs.fieldcamp.ai/en/collections/13754966-getting-started): Account setup, first workspace 
- [Handy AI](- [Getting Started](https://docs.fieldcamp.ai/en/collections/13754966-getting-started): Handy AI is the intelligence layer behind FieldCamp
- [CRM for Field Service Product Documentation](https://docs.fieldcamp.ai/en/collections/13784563-crm): FieldCamp’s CRM is built specifically for field service businesses — giving you a simple, powerful way to manage clients, track history, and personalize every interaction.
- [AI Job Scheduling, Checklists and intake process](https://docs.fieldcamp.ai/en/collections/13787169-job-management): Learn how to select the client, assign technicians, set job details, and choose a schedule that fits.
- [Dispatching technicians and route optimization](https://docs.fieldcamp.ai/en/collections/13787277-dispatch): The Dispatch collection covers everything you need to schedule, assign, and monitor jobs across your entire field team.
- [Price Books and Inventory Management](https://docs.fieldcamp.ai/en/collections/13786688-products-services-and-inventory): This section helps you organize your entire catalog — from one-time products and recurring services to inventory levels and stock locations.
- [Quoting, Invoicing and Payments inside FieldCamp](https://docs.fieldcamp.ai/en/collections/13788133-grow): The Grow module helps you handle the business side of field work — from sending estimates to collecting payments.
- [Workflow automation](https://docs.fieldcamp.ai/en/collections/14815115-workflow-automation): Learn how to automate workflows inside FieldCamp and get rid of the repetitive admin processes.
- [Service Area management and online booking](https://docs.fieldcamp.ai/en/collections/14629957-online-booking): Learn how to set up online job scheduling for your business using FieldCamp.
- [Analytics](https://docs.fieldcamp.ai/en/collections/13839396-analytics): Track metrics, build dashboards, and make smarter decisions with real-time insights into your field service operations.

## Core Platform & Features
- [Main Platform](https://fieldcamp.ai/): AI Assistant, Unified Search, Email Agent, conversational job management
- [How It Works](https://fieldcamp.ai/how-it-works/): Natural language commands, automated workflows, real-time sync
- [Pricing Plans](https://fieldcamp.ai/pricing/): Pro ($35/user) and Enterprise plans with feature comparison
- [AI Command Center](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/ai-command-center/): Conversational AI for job scheduling and management
- [AI Job Scheduling](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/ai-job-scheduling/): Smart technician assignment based on skills, location, availability
- [AI Dispatch Scheduling](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/ai-dispatch-scheduling/): Automated job assignment and route optimization
- [AI Route Optimization](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/ai-route-optimization/): Intelligent routing to minimize travel time
- [AI Workflow Builder](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/ai-workflow-builder/): Visual automation for custom business processes
- [AI CRM](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/ai-crm/): Client data unification, automated follow-ups, sales pipeline management
- [Field Service Invoicing](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/field-service-invoicing-software/): Automated billing and payment processing
- [Quotes & Estimates](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/quotes/): Digital quote creation and conversion tracking
- [Reporting Software](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/field-service-reporting-software/): Real-time analytics and performance dashboards
- [Inventory Management](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/inventory-management/): Stock tracking, low-stock alerts, purchase orders
- [Team Management](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/team-management/): Role-based access, technician scheduling, performance tracking
- [Checklists & Forms](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/checklists-forms/): Digital job forms and compliance documentation
- [File Management](https://fieldcamp.ai/features/file-management/): Secure document storage and photo management

## AI Receptionist
- [AI Receptionist and voice agents](https://fieldcamp.ai/ai-receptionist): AI Receptionist for field service businesses to automatically schedule jobs

- [Janitorial](https://fieldcamp.ai/industries/janitorial/): Commercial janitorial service management

## Free Tools & Resources
- [Labor Cost Calculator](https://fieldcamp.ai/free-tools/labor-cost-calculator/): Calculate true technician costs including taxes and benefits.
- [Invoice Templates](https://fieldcamp.ai/free-tools/invoice-template/): Industry-specific invoice templates for 20+ trades.
- [Profit Margin Calculator](https://fieldcamp.ai/free-tools/profit-margin-calculator/): Instantly determine your service profit margins and ensure sustainable pricing.
- [Service Price Calculator](https://fieldcamp.ai/free-tools/service-price-calculator/): Set optimal service prices based on costs, desired margins, and market benchmarks.
- [House Cleaning Cost Calculator](https://fieldcamp.ai/free-tools/house-cleaning-cost-calculator/): Estimate accurate pricing for house cleaning jobs by factoring in labor, materials, and overhead.
- [Lawn Care Cost Calculator](https://fieldcamp.ai/free-tools/lawn-care-cost-calculator/): Generate precise lawn care service quotes tailored to job size and requirements.
- [Roofing Cost Calculator](https://fieldcamp.ai/free-tools/roofing-cost-calculator/): Calculate comprehensive roofing project costs for accurate client estimates.
- [HVAC Load Calculator](https://fieldcamp.ai/free-tools/hvac-load-calculator/): Determine HVAC system requirements and load calculations for residential and commercial projects.
- [HVAC CFM Calculator](https://fieldcamp.ai/free-tools/hvac-cfm-calculator/): Calculate required air flow (CFM) for HVAC installations and upgrades.
- [Pipe Volume Calculator](https://fieldcamp.ai/free-tools/pipe-volume-calculator/): Compute pipe volume for plumbing, irrigation, and construction projects.
